tokens.text: begs when players hold food it likes

generated_doNotEdit.title: Beg Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows this mob to look at and follow the player that holds food they like.

fields.title: Items
fields.description: List of items that this mob likes

fields.title: Look Distance
fields.description: Distance in blocks the mob will beg from

fields.title: Look Time
fields.description: The range of time in seconds this mob will stare at the player holding a food they like, begging for it

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
